subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tim Stapleton ended his first N.H.L. game with a decisive shootout goal in the third round, leading the Maple Leafs to a 5-4 victory over the Islanders.
snippet: Tim Stapleton ended his first N.H.L. game with a decisive shootout goal in the third round, leading the Maple Leafs to a 5-4 victory over the Islanders.
